ComicInfo.Title: The Editor Who Loved My Stuff- Epilog; The Editor Who Loved My Stuff- Part 3; The Editor Who Loved My Stuff- Part 2; The Editor Who Loved My Stuff- Part 1; My New York Ball!; Take it Off

ComicInfo.Summary:
Lucy visits and gives news about Carolyn.
Rocky narrates a story over the phone while Denny is making love.
Denny gets into a sexual relationship with a magazine editor.
Howard and friends go to a latin whorehouse in the Bronx.
A stripper invites Denny to her club's dressing room.
